title: Beat applicant tracking systems with 88% off this top-rated resume building tool
description:
Finding a job is a full-time job in itself, and the right resume can help you find a great role faster. A resumé builder like HipCV not only creates the application materials for the job you want but also gives you valuable insight into who’s looking.

It begins with a resume designed for both applicant tracking systems (ATS) and human beings. Rated the #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt, HipCV formats your text and helps you craft the right resume for the job, with pre-written phrases to better fit what you’re trying to say. It can also design your cover letters for consistency across applications.

Once you’re ready to send it out, a suite of tools logs what jobs you’ve applied for and where you are in the process. Analytics tell you how often your resume is visited and when, and it’s always accessible through a browser and as a PDF.

Whether you’re looking for work or switching careers, a good resume can make a real difference. This lifetime HipCV Pro Plan smooths over the rougher parts of the job search for $99 or 88% off.
